title: Promoted to the same divison!
body:
Hello! I was in promos with one free win from the win before this game that i won and got promoted to the same division!

Sup w' dat?

replies.body:
Same Happend Herr.

I got a promo from Silver 2 to Silver 2 with 
-win(from earlier promo try)-
-lose-
-win.

We definitely try to respond as soon as we can, but even Poros have to sleep.  We're also available through the [ticketing system](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as well if you ever need to reach out to Player Support.  

Looking into this for you, it looks like you were recently promoted to Silver 2.  In fact, that means you **skipped **a division from 4 which is pretty awesome.  If it's still showing you as 4, a relog should resync you.  Hope that helps clear things up.
i guess riot doesnt give a fuck
